shippingapp

Class Shipper

  • java.lang.Object
    • shippingapp.Shipper

  • public class Shipper
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the calculation of shipping rates for packages to various regions
    Author:
    Jeffrey Kirman, Jose Mastrangelo
